endpointName.description: An endpoint in customer's account which has `data_capture_config` enabled.

localPath.description: Path to the filesystem where the endpoint data is available to the container. Defaults to `/opt/ml/processing/input`.

s3DataDistributionType.description: Whether input data distributed in Amazon S3 is fully replicated or sharded by an S3 key. Defaults to `FullyReplicated`. Valid values are `FullyReplicated` or `ShardedByS3Key`

s3InputMode.description: Whether the `Pipe` or `File` is used as the input mode for transferring data for the monitoring job. `Pipe` mode is recommended for large datasets. `File` mode is useful for small files that fit in memory. Defaults to `File`.  Valid values are `Pipe` or `File`
